title: ETL Test Engineer+ Python

Join us and help the world‚Äôs leading organizations‚ÄØunlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.

**What You'll Love About Working With Us**
 We value flexibility and support a healthy work\\-life balance through remote and hybrid work options.
   

  

**Competitive Compensation And Benefits.**
 Career development programs and certifications in cloud technologies.
   

  

 A diverse and inclusive workplace that fosters innovation and collaboration.
   

  

 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55\\-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end\\-to\\-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.

title: Sr. Engineer QA/QC
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Larsen And Toubro Construction is a premier company specializing in heavy civil infrastructure, metallurgical, material handling, and road and expressways construction services. Renowned for its large\\-scale projects, the company is a trusted player in real estate and construction sectors. It is dedicated to delivering world\\-class engineering and construction solutions across diverse industries. With a strong presence in the market, Larsen And Toubro excels in executing projects with precision and efficiency.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 We are seeking a full\\-time Sr. Engineer QA/QC to join our team in Jamnagar, in an on\\-site capacity. The primary responsibilities include overseeing quality assurance and quality control processes, executing testing activities, developing and managing test cases, and conducting manual and software testing. Additional duties involve ensuring adherence to quality standards, identifying and resolving any issues during testing, and collaborating with multidisciplinary teams to uphold project quality.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Proficiency in Test Execution and creating and maintaining Test Cases.
* Strong expertise in Quality Assurance and Manual Testing processes.
* Experience in Software Testing and ability to identify and resolve defects effectively.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for team collaboration.
* Relevant certification in Quality Assurance or related fields is a plus.
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Engineering or a related field.
* Demonstrated experience in QA/QC roles within construction or related industries.

title: Senior Software Engineer / Senior Full-Stack Engineer
description:
**Company Description** 








 Vedsora is an innovative AI\\-powered global platform revolutionizing music education and connection. By integrating students, teachers, suppliers, and service providers, Vedsora delivers a seamless digital ecosystem for learning and experiencing music. Students can find qualified teachers, access personalized lessons, and join a global music community, while teachers can enhance their reach and manage their schedules. The platform also supports the music industry with a marketplace for instruments and services. Vedsora‚Äôs vision is to make music education accessible and inspiring worldwide, blending technology, creativity, and collaboration to transform the future of MusicTech and EdTech.
 



  





**Role Description** 








 This is a full\\-time/ Part time remote role for a Senior Software Engineer / Senior Full\\-Stack Engineer. The role involves designing, coding, testing, and maintaining robust, scalable, and high\\-performance web applications. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to understand requirements, architect technical solutions, and drive projects from inception to completion. Additionally, you will lead code reviews, mentor junior engineers, and stay updated on emerging technologies to continually improve the platform.
 



  





**Qualifications** 







* Strong foundation in Computer Science principles and concepts
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development, including server\\-side frameworks and database design
* Extensive experience in Software Development, including problem\\-solving and debugging
* Skilled in Programming and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) languages such as Java, Python, or similar
* Familiarity with cloud platforms and DevOps practices is a plus
* Experience with scalable architectures and performance optimization
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills, with a focus on teamwork
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or equivalent field

title: UNITY DEVELOPER ‚Äì KIDS RACING & STUNT GAME ‚Äì OPENSOURCE
description:
UNITY DEVELOPER ‚Äì KIDS RACING \\& STUNT GAME ‚Äì OPENSOURCE
 



  





 Freelance Project \\| Mobile (iOS / Android) \\| Single Player \\| Family\\-Safe
 



  





 The project allows the use of MIT open source code (commercial license) and temporary placeholder assets from free or paid asset libraries. All work will be performed under a Work for Hire arrangement.
 



  





 Delivery will be in the form of a functional MVP (complete gameplay using placeholders), with later replacement by official Giramille assets.
 



  





 ‚∏ª
 



  





 About Giramille
 



  





 Giramille is a children‚Äôs entertainment studio focused on educational, family\\-friendly, and safe content for kids. We operate our own ad\\-free application featuring games and interactive experiences for children.
 



  





 We are currently developing a new original Giramille game, which will be integrated directly into our existing Unity\\-based application.
 



  





 This document fully describes the technical, creative, and functional scope of the project and serves both as a job description and as a contractual appendix.
 



  





 ‚∏ª
 



  





 Game Overview
 



  





 The project consists of developing a single\\-player arcade\\-style children‚Äôs game, designed for kids aged 5 to 8, with a focus on:
 



 ‚Ä¢ Immediate fun
 



 ‚Ä¢ Simple controls
 



 ‚Ä¢ Constant feedback
 



 ‚Ä¢ Short progression loops
 



 ‚Ä¢ Zero frustration
 



  





 The game allows the child to choose between different vehicle\\-based modalities, each with three scenarios, competing against AI\\-controlled bots or completing stunt\\-based challenges, depending on the selected modality.
 



  





 ‚∏ª
 



  





 Unified Arena Concept
 



  





 The game takes place within a single, large interactive universe, structured as a giant, living sports arena. This arena acts as the central hub of the game: when a modality is selected, the entire arena dynamically transforms to match the chosen experience.
 



  





 If the child selects a racing mode, the arena becomes a full racetrack; if an aquatic mode is chosen, the arena transforms into a large lake or sea; if snow is selected, the arena becomes a snowy track, and so on. Regardless of the modality, the arena will always feature spectators, cheering crowds, and event\\-style visual elements, reinforcing the feeling of a kid\\-friendly sports spectacle within one cohesive universe.
 



  





 ‚∏ª
 



  





 General Game Structure
 



  





 Game Type
 



 ‚Ä¢ Single Player
 



 ‚Ä¢ No multiplayer
 



 ‚Ä¢ No ads
 



 ‚Ä¢ No in\\-app purchases
 



 ‚Ä¢ No use of real\\-world registered brands
 



  





 Core Mechanics
 



 ‚Ä¢ Simple controls (steering \\+ auto\\-accelerate)
 



 ‚Ä¢ Arcade physics (not simulation)
 



 ‚Ä¢ Short sessions (60‚Äì120 seconds)
 



 ‚Ä¢ Constant visual and sound feedback
 



 ‚Ä¢ Frequent rewards
 



 ‚Ä¢ Device vibration (haptics) on collisions
 



  





 ‚∏ª
